scripts.dev: pnpm build:mfes && concurrently --kill-others --names "SHELL,DARTA,CHALANI" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgCyan.bold" "pnpm dev:shell" "pnpm preview:darta" "pnpm preview:chalani"
scripts.guard:ds-react: if grep -R "@carbon/react\|from 'react'\|from \"react\"" packages/design-system/src >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo '❌ @egov/design-system must be CSS-only (no React/@carbon/react)'; exit 1; else echo '✅ design-system is CSS-only'; fi
scripts.guard:css: grep -R "@carbon/styles" apps/mfe-* || true && if grep -R "@carbon/styles" apps/mfe-*; then echo '❌ MFEs must not import Carbon CSS'; exit 1; else echo '✅ CSS ownership OK'; fi
